synopsis.text:
Tuesday and Carole, two aspiring musicians from different walks of life, find themselves on Mars, fifty years after humanity began colonizing the red planet. In a world where AI dominates cultural production and people are content as passive consumers, these two young women yearn for something more.

Carole, a determined and resourceful resident of the bustling Alba City, works part-time jobs to support her dream of becoming a musician. Despite the city's vibrant atmosphere, she can't shake the feeling that something is missing from her life. Meanwhile, Tuesday, a privileged girl from the quaint Herschel City, longs for a deeper connection with the world around her. Misunderstood by her affluent family and peers, she feels isolated and alone in her pursuit of music.

A chance encounter brings these two souls together, and they discover a shared passion for creating music. As they embark on their musical journey, they find solace and strength in each other, believing that together, they can make a difference. Even if their impact starts as just a small wave, they trust that it will eventually grow into something much larger, challenging the status quo and inspiring others to embrace their creativity.
